Nneka Asuzu

← Back to Home

I’m a Data Scientist with a Master of Science in Management and Systems from New York University, specializing in Database Technologies, Data Analytics, and IT Security. I apply machine learning, NLP, cloud computing, and advanced analytics to solve real-world problems.

My drive to make technology better fuels my passion for research. I love exploring new methodologies and tools to continuously improve models and systems, ultimately making data science more effective and impactful. I thrive on discovering insights, testing hypotheses, and creating innovative solutions that translate complex data into actionable intelligence.

My work is rooted in the belief that continuous research and adaptation are key to advancing both technology and business outcomes.
